p: As in previous studies [16], [28], titres reported correspond to 100% neutralisation of pseudotype or virus input and are reported as IC 100 endpoint reciprocal dilutions. Mean neutralising titres were considered positive at the next dilution level above that at which there was no neutralisation against rabies (CVS-11) in previous studies: >1∶40 for the pseudotype assay and >1∶9 for the mFAVN [16], [28].
